review_text: The wait staff were average. The food had potential. Don't waste your money on the healthy juices because they are simple, unremarkable, and expensive for what they are. This cafe is suitable if you are looking for a light bright atmosphere with natural light to have a quiet conversation with others or to study with a coffee.

I have enjoyed espresso with mineral water over here many times. Their espresso is amazing, tasty and very well done. This is very comfortable environment, with very good WiFi (easy to use your VPN as well) and low noise. I was able to read and do some work from here. It is very stylish, both inside, and the view you...
